alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 1:38PM CST until January 06 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...LIGHT TO MODERATE SNOW EXPECTED TO CONTINUE INTO EARLY THIS EVENING AND VERY COLD WIND CHILLS EXPECTED TONIGHT INTO FRIDAY MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate to Occasionally Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Door County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
